content: . The status is "ACTIVE" for ground activities assigned to the crew and "CANCELLED" for removed ground activities. | | extraInfo | `'string'` | Extra information | # Crew Flight Transport Data Model | Attribute | Type | Description | | :-------------- | :------------ | :-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | | rosterId | `'string'` | Published roster id of the crew, including this flight transport | | tripId | `'string'` | Trip id of the crew, including this flight transport | | dutyId | `'string'` | Duty id of the crew, including this flight transport | | legId | `'string'` | Flight leg id of the transport. This field is filled only for SunExpress-operated flights. | | flightId | `'string'` | Flight identifier. A flight may include multiple flight leg due to operational reasons.| | crewId | `'string'` | Company employee number | | udor | `'date'` | Date of origination in UTC | | carrier | `'string'` | Carrier code (e.g., TK, XQ, etc.) | | flightNumber | `'string'` | Flight number | | suffix | `'string'` | Suffix code | | departureAirport| `'string'` | Airport of departure | | arrivalAirport | `'string'` | Airport of arrival | | departureDate | `'datetime'` | Scheduled departure time in UTC | | arrivalDate | `'datetime'` | Scheduled arrival time in UTC | | type | `'string'` | Type of the flight transport | | status | `'string'` | Status of the activity. The status is "ACTIVE" for flight transports assigned to the crew and "CANCELLED" for removed flight transports.| | extraInfo | `'string'` | Extra information | # Crew Ground Transport Data Model | Attribute | Type | Description | | :---------------- | :--------: | :------------------------------------------------- | | rosterId | `'string'` | Published roster id of the crew, including this ground transport | | tripId | `'string'` | Trip id of the crew, including this ground transport | | dutyId | `'string'` | Duty id of the crew, including this ground transport
